name: groupCreate
description:
Create a [group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Group-Management-) under an account. You can add a maximum of 100 groups in one account per day. If you go over, you will get an error. You can add a maximum of 5000 groups in one account. **Prerequisite**: Pro or higher account.
**Scopes**: `group:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
